context: Impaction / Impacted Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
I visited for Wisdom Tooth Extraction, RCT - Single Sitting
I thought surgical procedure is very long and painfull but it has taken only few minutes and without pain as well.\nComing to root canal I thought it will take 2\/3 seatings but it was completed in single seating.\nI highly recommend Dr. Swetha and Dr.Javed and I will suggest everyone to visit this clinic.

Initially I was very much concerned about surgical procedures. I used to avoid them at all costs if possible. Due to my neglecting and avoiding behaviour, my tooth pain had become worse. So I visited Asian dental clinic for my treatment. Dr Swetha had suggested tooth removal due to over destruction of my tooth. She explained the procedure before performing and made sure that I was calm and composed. Procedure was done very quickly and it was perfect with no pain and complications. I highly recommend her to everyone.
I was so nervous for removing my wisdom tooth but Dr swetha explained procedure very clearly and clarified by doubts and procedure went smoothly. I highly recommend her.

Visited for dental implant treatment and Dr.Swetha told us to go for All on 4. The tooth extraction and dental implant placement went well and we are happy with treatment. I would recommend her to anyone looking for the **** dentist for implant surgery.Highly recommended
